item.title: Human-Computer Interaction (HCI) on Ageing Soceity in East and North-East Asia (ENEA)
item.description: Jun Hahn, ACM SIGCHI Communication Ambassador According to United Nations Economic and Social Commission for Asia and the Pacific (UN ESCAP), population ageing in East and North-East Asia (ENEA) is distinctly remarkable as the sub-region is home to a high ratio of elder people in the world [1]. In 2015, 32% of people in the world, older than 65 years old, are living in ENEA. In Asia, 56% of the older persons are from ENEA.
